message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'll take the bigger share
I think 55-45 is a more reasonable split, considering I'm the one losing value over time.
Considering your loss in value, I'll offer 58-42. It's the best I can do for now.
I'd rather take a smaller share now than risk losing even more value in the next rounds.
I see you're getting desperate, but I'll only go down to 57-43. Take it or leave it.
